title: Cash Back Mastercard retention playbook
content: If customers mention rewards elsewhere, emphasize 1.5% baseline cash back and limited-time boosts. Reinforce no annual fee and fraud protection.

title: Service recovery guidance
content: Acknowledge service issues, confirm resolution timeline, and offer a statement credit or concierge escalation for high-risk customers.

title: Onboarding support
content: Provide quick-start steps, set up autopay, and highlight top cash back categories to improve early engagement.

title: Rate sensitivity response
content: Offer temporary APR relief, highlight balance management tools, and outline payment schedule options.
